resources.string:
The game's focus is a map that shows multiple different landmarks in Fredericton. This game uses location services to know your location in Fredericton, and then allows a landmark to be claimed when you are within a 50m radius (your distance from the closest landmark is displayed on the bottom of the screen). 
A landmark becomes claimable when it changes from red to yellow, and to open the information window, you tap on it. Tapping the "claim" button will claim your landmark and redeem points! 
Each landmark has a different number of points, so some are more valuable than others! 
Good luck, and have fun! :)
